name: Advanced MathMeister
description:
The Sequel To MathMeister Has Arrived!

With a brand new 4 X 5 grid system, you can string up to SEVEN number and operation blocks to lengthen and optimized your equations. With new animations, punchy sound effects, and a boosted game speed, Advanced MathMeister has become the most explosive MathMeister to date!

With an additional THREE bonus modes, there are tons of Arcady, score-based goodness to sink your teeth into.

TIME TRIAL

The score attack mode from MathMeister: How fast can you calculate? has made it's grand return. With a faster speed and a more dynamic time system, challenge hi-scores that were thought impossible before

UNKNOWN GOAL

Utilize the camera's alerts and sound effects to score as many goals before time!

MOVE COUNTER

Take your time making the most optimized calculations...But every calculation counts. (Pro Tip: Use it as a training mode of sorts if you'd like.)

CPU TIME ATTACK

A brand new game mode, where you take turns against an enemy CPU. You both got a strict time limit: only 45 seconds. Luckily, your timer will stop when it's the CPU's turn.  But be aware, as the CPU won't be a pushover either...

The game has risen up to the challenge.  Have you?
